#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    char ch[101];
	    scanf("%s",ch);
	    int n=strlen(ch);
	    int i,c=0;
	    for(i=0; i<n; i++)
	    {
	        if(ch[i]=='a'||ch[i]=='e'||ch[i]=='i'||ch[i]=='o'||ch[i]=='u'||ch[i]=='A'||ch[i]=='E'||ch[i]=='I'||ch[i]=='O'||ch[i]=='U')
	        c++;
	    }
	    if(c>0)
	    cout<<"yes"<<endl;
	    else if(c==0)
	    cout<<"no"<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
